Key ties: Kolya–Smurov (friend), Smurov–Ilusha (acquaintance), Ilusha–Snegiryov (parent), Kolya–Smurov (friend), +15 more

story_summary: Kolya leaves his home and meets Smurov, a boy forbidden to associate with him, to visit Ilusha, who is very ill. They walk through the market-place, encountering various townspeople and engaging in conversations, including a brief confrontation with a young man and exchanges with peasants. Upon reaching near Captain Snegiryov's lodging, Kolya instructs Smurov to fetch Alexey Karamazov to meet him outside in the cold.
evidence_quotes: I’ve been waiting for you for the last hour, Krassotkin
Kolya stopped and told Smurov to go on ahead and ask Karamazov
